<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">including goods, leases,
securities (whether or not certificated), commercial paper, financial assets,
commodities, accounts, equipment, chattel paper, derivatives, instruments,
money, claims, licenses, Contracts, Intellectual Property, royalties and
general intangibles, and any proceeds of any of the foregoing.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Registered Intellectual
Property</font></b>&#148; means Intellectual Property that has been issued
registered, filed, certified or otherwise perfected by recordation or currently
pending with any Governmental Body anywhere in the world.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Related Agreements</font></b>&#148;
means the Escrow Agreement, the Voting Agreement, the Option Amendment and
Consent, the Note and Warrant Amendment and Consent, the Acknowledgment and Consent
of B3 Consulting, the Merger Certificate, and any other Contract or certificate
to be executed or delivered by the Company, the Stockholder Agent, any Equity
Holders or any Special Payees at the Closing, or otherwise in connection with
this Agreement, any of the foregoing agreements or the consummation of the
Transactions.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Related Party</font></b>&#148;
means, (A)&nbsp;with respect to any individual, (i)&nbsp;each other member of
such individual&#146;s Family, (ii)&nbsp;any Entity that is directly or indirectly
controlled by any one or more members of such individual&#146;s Family, (iii)&nbsp;any
Entity in which members of such individual&#146;s Family hold (individually or in
the aggregate) a Material Interest, and (iv)&nbsp;any Entity with respect to
which one or more members of such individual&#146;s Family serves as a director,
officer, member, partner, executor or trustee (or in a similar capacity), and (B)&nbsp;with
respect to any Entity, (i)&nbsp;any Affiliate of specified Entity, (ii)&nbsp;any
Person that holds a Material Interest in such specified Entity, (iii)&nbsp;each
Person that serves as a director, officer, employee, partner, manager, member,
executor or trustee (or in a similar capacity) of such specified Entity, (iv)&nbsp;any
other Entity in which such specified Entity holds a Material Interest, (v)&nbsp;any
Person with respect to which such specified Person serves as a general partner,
manager or trustee (or in a similar capacity), and (vi)&nbsp;any Related Party
of any individual who is a Related Party pursuant to clauses (i)-(v)&nbsp;next
above.&#160;&#160; For purposes of this definition
of &#147;Related Party&#148;, (a)&nbsp;&#147;Family&#148; means, with respect to an individual, (i)&nbsp;such
individual, (ii)&nbsp;such individual&#146;s spouse, (iii)&nbsp;any other natural
person who is related to such individual or such individual&#146;s spouse within the
second degree, and (iv)&nbsp;any other individual who resides with such
individual and any immediate family member of such other individual, and (b)&nbsp;&#147;Material
Interest&#148; means direct or indirect beneficial ownership (as defined in Rule&nbsp;13d-3
under the Exchange Act) of voting securities or other voting interests
representing at least ten percent (10%) of the outstanding voting power of an
Entity or Equity Interests representing at least ten percent (10%) of the
outstanding Equity Interests in an Entity.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Remedial Action</font></b>&#148;
means all actions, including any capital expenditures, required (i)&nbsp;to
clean up, remove, treat or in any other way address any Materials of
Environmental Concern or other substance, (ii)&nbsp;to prevent the
Environmental Release or Threat of Release or to minimize the further Environmental
Release of any Materials of Environmental Concern or other substance so it does
not migrate or endanger or threaten to endanger public health or welfare or the
Environment, (iii)&nbsp;to perform pre-remedial studies and investigations or
post-remedial monitoring and care, or (iv)&nbsp;to bring all Facilities and the
operations conducted thereon into compliance with Environmental Laws and
environmental Governmental Permits.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">71</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Representatives</font></b>&#148;
means, with respect to any Person, such Person&#146;s officers, directors,
employees, managers, consultants, contractors, agents, financial, banking and
legal advisors or other representatives.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Scheduled Intellectual
Property</font></b>&#148; means (A)&nbsp;any Company Intellectual Property, and (B)&nbsp;any
other Intellectual Property that is used or contemplated to be used in
connection with the business or operations of the Company, or that is licensed
to the Company (other than non-customized third-party software licensed to the
Company for internal use on a non-exclusive basis), the use or ownership of
which is material, or reasonably expected to be material, to the business or
operations of the Company as presently conducted or presently proposed to be
conducted.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">SEC</font></b>&#148; means the
United States Securities and Exchange Commission.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Securities Act</font></b>&#148;
means the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Securities</font></b>&#148;
means any stock, capital stock or similar security, shares, partnership
(general or limited) interests, membership or limited liability company interests
or units, interests in a joint venture, voting trust certificates, certificates
of interest or participation in any profit sharing agreement or arrangement or
business trust, voting trust certificate, investment contract, bonds,
debentures, notes, or other evidences of indebtedness, secured or unsecured,
convertible, subordinated or otherwise, or in general any instruments commonly
known as &#147;securities&#148;, or any certificates of interest or participations in,
temporary or interim certificates for, receipt for, guarantees of, warrants or
rights to subscribe to, purchase or otherwise acquire, or any other
Commitments, puts or other options, futures, or certificate of deposit for, any
of the foregoing.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Security Interest</font></b>&#148;
means any Lien, except for (i)&nbsp;liens for taxes, assessments, governmental
charges, or claims that are being contested in good faith by appropriate
Actions promptly instituted and diligently conducted and only to the extent
that a reserve or other appropriate provision, if any, has been made on the
face of the Company Financial Statements in an amount equal to the Liability
for which the lien is asserted, (ii)&nbsp;statutory liens of landlords and
warehousemen&#146;s, carriers&#146;, mechanics&#146;, suppliers&#146;, materialmen&#146;s, repairmen&#146;s,
or other like liens (including Contractual landlords&#146; liens) arising in the
Ordinary Course of Business and with respect to amounts not yet delinquent, or
with respect to amounts being contested in good faith by appropriate
proceedings, and (iii)&nbsp;liens incurred or deposits made in the Ordinary
Course of Business in connection with workers&#146; compensation, unemployment
insurance and other similar types of social security.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Software</font></b>&#148; means
any software or computer program, including firmware and other software
embedded in hardware devices, whether in the form of source code, assembly
code, script, interpreted language, instruction sets or binary or object code
(including compiled and executable programs), including any library, component
or module of any of the foregoing, together with (i)&nbsp;any related default
configuration files, (ii)&nbsp;runtime data, files and objects, such as icons,
buttons, configuration files and the like, needed for the proper operation of
the Software, (iii)&nbsp;screens, user interfaces, report formats, templates
and menus, and (iv)&nbsp;user documentation and help files, including with
regard to any command-line options and switches.&#160; With respect to source code, &#147;Software&#148; also
includes (i)&nbsp;all code written in any programming</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">72</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">language or scripting
language, (ii)&nbsp;developer comments, (iii)&nbsp;associated header or
interface definition files, (iv)&nbsp;IDE configuration or project files and
the like, (v)&nbsp;compilation or build files, scripts or tools, including
makefiles, (vi)&nbsp;API and class documentation, Gantt charts and other
diagrams, materials or other documentation explaining the structure, flow
controls, class hierarchy, algorithms, data structures, API or composition of
such source code, (vii)&nbsp;compilation or build instructions (whether meant
for use by developers or compilation or build programs, scripts or tools), (viii)&nbsp;interpreted
data, icons, buttons and other images, files, materials and data used in the
generation of the executable or needed for the proper execution or use of the
Software, and (ix)&nbsp;any design notes and material proprietary information
or algorithms contained in or relating to such source code.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Special Payees</font></b>&#148;
shall have the meaning set forth in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Subsidiary</font></b>&#148;
means, with respect to any Person: (a)&nbsp;any corporation in which a
controlling interest in the total voting power of all classes of the Equity
Interests entitled (without regard to the occurrence of any contingency) to
vote in the election of directors is owned by such Person directly or through
one or more other Subsidiaries of such Person and (b)&nbsp;any Person other
than a corporation of which at least a controlling interest of the Equity
Interests (however designated) entitled (without regard to the occurrence of
any contingency) to vote in the election of the governing body, partners,
managers, or others that will control the management of such entity is owned by
such Person directly or through one or more other Subsidiaries of such Person.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tangible Personal Property</font></b>&#148;
means all machinery, equipment, tools, furniture, office equipment, computer
hardware, supplies, materials, vehicles and other items of tangible personal
property (other than inventories) of every kind owned or leased by the Company,
wherever located and whether or not carried on the Company&#146;s books, together
with any express or implied warranty by the manufacturers, sellers or lessors
of any item or component part thereof and all maintenance records and other
documents relating thereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tax</font></b>&#148; or,
collectively, &#147;Taxes,&#148; means (i)&nbsp;any and all taxes, including federal,
foreign, territorial, provincial, regional, state, city, municipal, county,
possession and local taxes, assessments and other governmental charges, levies,
fees, duties, impositions and liabilities, including taxes based upon or
measured by gross receipts, income, profits, sales, use, capital, occupation
and volume, quantity or weight of hazardous wastes generated or disposed of,
and value added, ad valorem, transfer, registration, stamp, estimated,
franchise, inventory, withholding, payroll, recapture, employment, windfall
profits, property, GST, capital, severance, premium, customs, duties and excise
taxes, retail sales, goods and services, commodity, harmonized, health,
education, social service, estate, succession, death, interest equalization,
severance, license, payroll, business, branch, premium, environmental,
disability, employee&#146;s income withholding, worker&#146;s compensation, employment
insurance, unemployment insurance, social insurance, health insurance and
social security taxes together with all interest, penalties and additions
imposed with respect to such amounts by any taxing authority (domestic or
foreign) and any obligations under any Contracts with any other Person with
respect to such amounts and including any liability for taxes of a predecessor
entity, including transferee liability, (ii)&nbsp;any liability for the payment
of any amounts of the type described in clause (i)&nbsp;next above as a result
of being a member of an affiliated, consolidated, combined or unitary group for</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">73</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='73',FILE='C:\JMS\mugovind\05-16127-1\task577603\16127-1-kc-03.htm',USER='mgovindaraj',CD='Sep 15 09:52 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">any period; and (iii)&nbsp;any
liability for the payment of any amounts of the type described in clauses (i)&nbsp;or
(ii)&nbsp;next above as a result of any express or implied obligation to indemnify
any other Person or as a result of any obligations under any Contract with any
other Person with respect to such amounts.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tax Return</font></b>&#148;
means any return, declaration, report, claim for refund, or information return
or statement relating to Taxes required to be filed with any Governmental Body,
including any schedule&nbsp;or attachment thereto, and including any amendment
thereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Technology</font></b>&#148;
means (A)&nbsp;the Company Products provided or proposed to be provided
(including those under development) by the Company in connection with its
business, and (B)&nbsp;the technology, tools, materials, products and services
used or proposed to be used in the operation of the business of the Company.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Threat of Release</font></b>&#148;
means a reasonable likelihood of an Environmental Release that may require
action in order to prevent or mitigate damage to the public health or welfare
or the Environment that may result from such Environmental Release.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Trade Secrets</font></b>&#148;
means all inventions and discoveries (whether or not patentable or whether or
not reduced to practice), improvements thereto, trade secrets, know-how,
concepts, ideas, devices, methods, processes, designs, plans, schematics,
drawings, blue prints, source code, interpreted instruction sets, formulae,
formulas, patterns, compilations, databases, technical data, data,
specifications, research and development information, data bases and other
proprietary or confidential information, whether business, technical or
otherwise, including emails and other electronic communications, such as
instant messenger logs and website submissions, customer complaints and
feedback, customer and supplier lists and related information, pricing and cost
information, advertising statistics, website user information, technology,
product roadmaps, and financial, sales, business and marketing plans, data,
specifications, technical data, schematics, know-how and information</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Transfer</font></b>&#148;
means, with respect to any Property, to sell, deed, dividend, distribute
(including upon liquidation or distribution), exchange, convey, consign,
negotiate, gift, devise, bequeath, pass by intestate succession, assign, issue,
or otherwise alienate, transfer or dispose of such Property or any interest
therein or right thereto, whether directly or indirectly (through another Person
or otherwise), whether voluntarily, involuntarily or by operation of law, and
whether with or without consideration.&#160;
The terms &#147;Transferred&#148; and &#147;Transferring&#148; shall have the correlative
meanings</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Transaction Documents</font></b>&#148;
means this Agreement, the Voting Agreements and the Escrow Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Transactions</font></b>&#148;
means all of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, including: (a)&nbsp;the
Merger, the filing of the Merger Certificate, and Parent&#146;s delivery of the
Purchase Price hereunder; (b)&nbsp;the execution, delivery, and performance of
all of the documents, instruments, and agreements to be executed, delivered,
and performed in connection herewith, including the Transaction Documents; and (c)&nbsp;the
performance by Parent and the Merger Sub, the Company,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">74</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='74',FILE='C:\JMS\mugovind\05-16127-1\task577603\16127-1-kc-03.htm',USER='mgovindaraj',CD='Sep 15 09:52 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the Equity Holders and
the Special Payees of their respective covenants and obligations under this
Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Treas. Reg.</font></b>&#148; or
&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Treasury Regulations</font></b>&#148; means the
temporary and final regulations promulgated under the Code.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">U.S. Export and Import
Laws</font></b>&#148; means the Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2778), the
International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR)(22 C.F.R. 120-130), the Export
Administration Act of 1979, as amended (50 U.S.C. 2401-2420), the Export
Administration Regulations (EAR)(15 C.F.R. 730-774), and all other laws and
regulations of the United States Government regulating the provision of
services to non-U.S. parties or the export and import of articles or
information from and to the United States of America and non-U.S. parties.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[ THE REMAINDER OF THIS PAGE HAS BEEN INTENTIONALLY
LEFT BLANK ]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="48%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.1%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ Ronald L.
  Brown</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.16%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.74%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.1%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Ronald L. Brown,
  President</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Stockholder Agent hereby countersigns this Agreement for the purpose of
affirming and acknowledging its duties, obligations, powers, rights and responsibilities
under this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.16%;">

  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:51.84%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">STOCKHOLDER
  AGENT</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.23</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Confidential Portions of this document
have been redacted and filed separately with the Commission.<br>
[***] symbolizes language omitted pursuant to an application for Confidential
Treatment.</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">AMENDMENT
NO. 1<br>
TO<br>
MANUFACTURING SERVICES AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS AMENDMENT NUMBER 1
(&#147;<u>Amendment</u>&#148;) to that certain Manufacturing Services<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>Agreement,
dated as of November&nbsp;23, 2004 (the &#147;<u>Agreement</u>&#148;), is made and
entered into as of this 30th day of May, 2005, by and between Overland Storage,&nbsp;Inc.,
a California corporation, having a place of business at 4820 Overland Drive,
San Diego, CA&#160; 92123 (&#147;<u>Overland</u>&#148;),
and SANMINA-SCI Corporation, a
Delaware corporation, on behalf of itself and its wholly-owned subsidiaries and
having its principal place of business at 2700 North First Street, San Jose,
California 95134, (&#147;<u>SANMINA-SCI</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RECITALS</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in
consideration of the mutual promises, covenants and other terms and conditions
contained in this Amendment and for other good and valuable consideration, the
receipt of which is acknowledged by both parties, the parties agree as follows:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:bold;">Amendment</font></u></b><b><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:bold;">.</font></b><font face="Times New Roman">&#160; The Agreement is hereby amended and modified
so that a new Section&nbsp;8.5 and 8.6 are added as follows: </font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.5</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:bold;">Standard of Care</font></u></b><font face="Times New Roman">.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Without
limiting the generality of Sections 8.1, 8.2, 8.3 and 8.4 with respect to
SANMINA-SCI&#146;S care procedures for CUSTOMER Furnished Items or the insurance
requirements of Section&nbsp;10 pertaining to insuring CUSTOMER Furnished
Items, SANMINA-SCI shall use [***] efforts to protect all CUSTOMER Furnished
Items and CUSTOMER Furnished Components from damage, pilferage, electrostatic
discharge (ESD), etc.&#160; CUSTOMER and
SANMINA-SCI acknowledge and agree that SANMINA-SCI shall not be responsible for
any loss of or damage to CUSTOMER Furnished Components provided that such loss
is less than [***]. SANMINA-SCI will, however, be responsible for any loses that
[***].</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.6</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:bold;">Extent of Liability</font></b><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160;
Subject to the limits defined in section&nbsp;8.5 the parties agree that
SANMINA-SCI&#146;s liability for any CUSTOMER Furnished Item is limited to [***].</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:bold;">Terms; No Other Changes</font></u></b><u><font face="Times New Roman">.</font></u><font face="Times New Roman">&#160; Any capitalized terms contained in this
Amendment and not defined in this Amendment have the meanings for such terms as
are set forth in the Agreement. Except as expressly provided in this Amendment,
the Agreement remains un-amended and unmodified and in full force and effect.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:bold;">General</font></u></b><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160;
This Amendment contains the entire agreement between the parties with
respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes any prior agreements,
negotiations, or representations between the parties with respect to the
subject matter hereof, whether written or oral.&#160;
This Amendment may be modified only by a subsequent written agreement
signed by the parties.&#160; If any provision
of this Amendment is held to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions will
continue unaffected.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:bold;">Law</font></u></b><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160;
This Amendment will be governed by and construed in accordance with the
laws of the State of California, applicable to contracts entered into, and
wholly to be performed within the State of California (regardless of the choice
of law principles of California or any other jurisdiction).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the
parties to this Amendment have caused this Amendment to be executed by their
duly authorized representatives as of the Effective Date.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="49%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.84%;">

  </td>

<TYPE>EX-10.41

<div>

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-variant:normal !important;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.41</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-variant:normal !important;">OVERLAND
STORAGE, INC.<br>
2003 EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOTICE OF RESTRICTED STOCK AWARD</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You
have been granted restricted shares of Common Stock of Overland Storage,&nbsp;Inc.
(the &#147;Company&#148;) on the following terms:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Name of Recipient:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total Number of Shares Granted:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Fair Market Value per Share:</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total Fair Market Value of Award:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Date of Grant:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Vesting Schedule:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You and the Company agree
that these shares are granted under and governed by the terms and conditions of
the Overland Storage,&nbsp;Inc. 2003 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) and the
Restricted Stock Agreement, which is attached to and made a part of this
document.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">You
further agree that the Company may deliver by email all documents relating to
the Plan or this award (including, without limitation, prospectuses required by
the Securities and Exchange Commission) and all other documents that the
Company is required to deliver to its security holders (including, without
limitation, annual reports and proxy statements).&#160; You also agree that the Company may deliver
these documents by posting them on a web site maintained by the Company or by a
third party under contract with the Company.&#160;
If the Company posts these documents on a web site, it will notify you
by email</font>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">OVERLAND STORAGE, INC.<br>
2003 EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RESTRICTED STOCK AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Payment
  for Shares</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No payment is
  required for the shares that you are receiving.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Vesting</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The shares that
  you are receiving will vest in installments, as shown in the Notice of
  Restricted Stock Award.&nbsp; In addition,
  the shares vest in full if the following event occurs:</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.55pt;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">&#149;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font>Your
  Service terminates because of total and permanent disability, or death, or</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No additional
  shares vest after your Service has terminated for any reason.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For all purposes
  under this Agreement, &#147;total and permanent disability&#148; means that you are
  unable to engage in any substantial gainful activity by reason of any
  medically determinable physical or mental impairment which can be expected to
  result in death or which has lasted, or can be expected to last, for a
  continuous period of not less than one year.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Shares
  Restricted</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unvested shares
  will be considered &#147;Restricted Shares.&#148;&nbsp;
  You may not sell, transfer, pledge or otherwise dispose of any
  Restricted Shares without the written consent of the Company, except as
  provided in the next sentence.&nbsp; You may
  transfer Restricted Shares to your spouse, children or grandchildren or to a
  trust established by you for the benefit of yourself or your spouse, children
  or grandchildren, or pursuant to a Domestic Relations Order.&nbsp; However, a transferee of Restricted Shares
  must agree in writing on a form prescribed by the Company to be bound by all provisions
  of this Agreement.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Forfeiture</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If your Service
  terminates for any reason, then your shares will be forfeited to the extent
  that they have not vested before the termination date and do not vest as a
  result of the termination.&nbsp; This means
  that the Restricted Shares will immediately revert to the Company.&nbsp; You receive no payment for Restricted
  Shares that are forfeited.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company
  determines when your Service terminates for this purpose.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Leaves
  of Absence and Part-Time Work</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of
  this award, your Service does not terminate when you go on a military leave,
  a sick leave or another <i><font style="font-style:italic;">bona fide</font></i>
  leave of absence, if the leave was approved by the Company in writing and if
  continued crediting of Service is required by applicable law, the Company&#146;s
  leave of absence policy or the terms of your leave.&nbsp; But your Service terminates when the
  approved leave ends, unless you immediately return to active work.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If you go on a
  leave of absence, then the vesting schedule&nbsp;specified in the Notice of
  Restricted Stock Award may be adjusted in accordance with the Company&#146;s leave
  of absence policy or the terms of your leave.&nbsp;
  If you commence working on a part-time basis, then the vesting schedule&nbsp;specified
  in the Notice of Restricted Stock Award may be adjusted in accordance with
  the Company&#146;s part-time work policy or the terms of an agreement between you
  and the Company pertaining to your part-time schedule.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Stock
  Certificates</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The certificates
  for Restricted Shares have stamped on them a special legend referring to the
  Company&#146;s right of repurchase.&nbsp; In
  addition to or in lieu of imposing the legend, the Company may hold the
  certificates in escrow.&nbsp; As your vested
  percentage increases, you may request (at reasonable intervals) that the
  Company release to you a non-legended certificate for your vested shares.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Voting
  Rights</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You may vote
  your shares even before they vest.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Withholding
  Taxes</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No stock
  certificates will be released to you unless you have made acceptable
  arrangements to pay any withholding taxes that may be due as a result of this
  award or the vesting of the shares.&nbsp;
  With the Company&#146;s consent, these arrangements may include (a)&nbsp;withholding
  shares of Company stock that otherwise would be issued to you when they vest
  or (b)&nbsp;surrendering shares that you previously acquired. The fair market
  value of the shares you surrender, determined as of the date when taxes
  otherwise would have been withheld in cash, will be applied as a credit
  against the withholding taxes.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-ki.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Restrictions
  on Resale</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You agree not to
  sell any shares at a time when Applicable Law, Company policies or an
  agreement between the Company and its underwriters prohibit a sale.&nbsp; This restriction will apply as long as your
  Service continues and for such period of time after the termination of your
  Service as the Company may specify.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">No
  Retention Rights</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Your award or
  this Agreement does not give you the right to be employed or retained by the
  Company or a subsidiary of the Company in any capacity.&nbsp; The Company and its subsidiaries reserve
  the right to terminate your Service at any time, with or without cause.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Adjustments</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event of
  a stock split, a stock dividend or a similar change in Company stock, the
  number of Restricted Shares that remain subject to forfeiture will be
  adjusted accordingly.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Applicable
  Law</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement
  will be interpreted and enforced under the laws of the State of California
  (without regard to its choice-of-law provisions).</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="259" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:194.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">The
  Plan and Other Agreements</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="481" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:360.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The text of the
  Plan is incorporated in this Agreement by reference.</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement
  and the Plan constitute the entire understanding between you and the Company
  regarding this award.&nbsp; Any prior
  agreements, commitments or negotiations concerning this award are superseded.&nbsp; This Agreement may be amended only by
  another written agreement between the parties.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">By signing the cover sheet of this Agreement, you
agree to all of the terms and conditions described above and in the Plan.</font></b></p>

 <tr>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.54%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#a5_Offering__105213">5.</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:85.58%;">

  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.54%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:85.58%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#a18_EffectiveDateAndSubsequentPla_105249">18.</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:85.58%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#a18_EffectiveDateAndSubsequentPla_105249">EFFECTIVE DATE AND
  SUBSEQUENT PLAN HISTORY</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>
