<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-kk.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1996 EMPLOYEE STOCK PURCHASE PLAN<br>
OF OVERLAND STORAGE, INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(as Amended and Restated Effective August&nbsp;22,
2005)</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a1_Purpose__105204"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>PURPOSE.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The purpose of
this Plan is to provide an opportunity for Employees of Overland Storage,&nbsp;Inc.
(the &#147;Corporation&#148;) and its Designated Subsidiaries, to purchase Common Stock
of the Corporation and thereby to have an additional incentive to contribute to
the prosperity of the Corporation.&#160; It is
the intention of the Corporation that the Plan qualify as an &#147;Employee Stock
Purchase Plan&#148; under Section&nbsp;423 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as
amended, although the Corporation makes no undertaking nor representation to
maintain such qualification.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a2_Definitions__105206"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>DEFINITIONS.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Board</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean the Board of Directors of the Corporation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;<u>Base Compensation</u>&#148;</font></b> means, with respect to each
Participant for each pay period, such Participant&#146;s Compensation, excluding (i)&nbsp;Bonus
Compensation; (ii)&nbsp;any amounts contributed by the Corporation or a
Designated Subsidiary to any pension plan, deferred compensation plan, or other
similar plan; (iii)&nbsp;any automobile allowance (or reimbursement for such
expenses); and (iv)&nbsp;any amounts paid as a starting bonus or finder&#146;s fee.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;<u>Bonus Compensation</u>&#148;</font></b> means, with respect to each
Participant for each period with respect to which a cash bonus is payable to
such Employee, the amount of the cash bonus payable to such Participant for
such period.&#160; Except as determined by the
Committee, Bonus Compensation does not include: (i)&nbsp;any amounts
contributed by the Corporation or a Designated Subsidiary to any pension plan,
deferred compensation plan, or other similar plan; (ii)&nbsp;any automobile
allowance (or reimbursement for such expenses); or (iii)&nbsp;any amounts paid as
a starting bonus or finder&#146;s fee.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;<u>Code</u>&#148;</font></b> shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986,
as amended.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Committee</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean the committee appointed by the Board in accordance with Section&nbsp;12
of the Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Common
Stock</u>&#148;</b> shall mean the Common Stock of the Corporation, or any stock
into which such Common Stock may be converted.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Compensation</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean an Employee&#146;s wages or salary and other amounts payable to an
Employee on account of personal services rendered by the Employee to the Corporation
or a Designated Subsidiary and which are reportable as wages or other
compensation on the Employee&#146;s Form&nbsp;W-2, plus pre-tax contributions of the
Employee under a cash or deferred arrangement (401(k) plan) or cafeteria plan
maintained by the Corporation or a</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-kk.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Designated Subsidiary, but excluding, however, (1)&nbsp;non-cash fringe
benefits, (2)&nbsp;special payments as determined by the Committee (e.g.,
moving expenses, unused vacation, severance pay), (3)&nbsp;income from the
exercise of stock options or other stock purchases and (4)&nbsp;any other items
of Compensation as determined by the Committee.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Corporation</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean Overland Storage,&nbsp;Inc., a California corporation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Designated
Subsidiary</u>&#148;</b> shall mean a Subsidiary which has been designated by the
Board as eligible to participate in the Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(j)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Employee</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean an individual classified as an employee (within the meaning of Code Section&nbsp;3401(c)&nbsp;and
the regulations thereunder) by the Corporation or a Designated Subsidiary on
the Corporation payroll records during the relevant participation period.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(k)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Entry
Date</u>&#148;</b> shall mean the first day of each Option Period.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(l)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Exercise
Date</u>&#148;</b> shall mean the last business day of each Exercise Period.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(m)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Exercise
Period</u>&#148; </b>shall mean a three-month, six-month or other period as
determined by the Board.&#160; The first
Exercise Period during an Option Period shall commence on the first day of such
Option Period.&#160; Subsequent Exercise
Periods, if any, shall run consecutively after the termination of the preceding
Exercise Period.&#160; The last Exercise
Period in an Option Period shall terminate on the last day of such Option
Period.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(n)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Fair
Market Value</u>&#148;</b> shall mean the value of one (1)&nbsp;share of Common
Stock on the relevant date, determined as follows:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If the shares are traded on an exchange,
the reported &#147;closing price&#148; on the last trading date immediately preceding the
relevant date;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If the shares are traded over-the-counter
on the Nasdaq Stock Market, the Nasdaq Official Closing Price reported for the
last trading date immediately preceding the relevant date;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If neither (1)&nbsp;nor (2)&nbsp;applies,
the fair market value as determined by the Committee in good faith.&#160; Such determination shall be conclusive and
binding on all persons.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(o)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;<u>Maximum Percentage</u>&#148;</font></b> means the maximum percentage of (i)&nbsp;Base
Compensation, or (ii)&nbsp;Base Compensation and Bonus Compensation, which a
Participant may elect to have withheld from Compensation pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.&#160; The Maximum Percentage will be fifteen
percent (15%) unless a lower percentage amount is designated by the Committee
with respect to an Option Period.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-kk.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(p)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Option
Period</u>&#148;</b> shall mean a period of up to twenty-seven (27) months as
determined by the Committee.&#160; The Board
may determine that the Option Period and the Exercise Period are the same.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(q)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Participant</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean a participant in the Plan as described in Section&nbsp;4 of the
Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(r)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Plan</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean this employee stock purchase plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(s)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>&#147;Shareholder</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean a record holder of shares entitled to vote shares of Common Stock
under the Corporation&#146;s by-laws.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(t)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Subsidiary</u>&#148;</b>
shall mean any corporation (other than the Corporation) in an unbroken chain of
corporations beginning with the Corporation, as described in Code Section&nbsp;424(f).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a3_Eligibility__105209"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">3.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>ELIGIBILITY.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">Any Employee
regularly employed on a full-time basis by the Corporation or by any Designated
Subsidiary on an Entry Date shall be eligible to participate in the Plan with
respect to the Option Period commencing on such Entry Date, provided that the
Committee may establish administrative rules&nbsp;requiring that employment
commence some minimum period (e.g., one pay period) prior to an Entry Date to
be eligible to participate with respect to that Entry Date and provided further
that (1)&nbsp;the Board may extend eligibility to part-time Employees pursuant
to criteria and procedures established by the Committee and (2)&nbsp;the Board
may impose an eligibility period on participation of up to two years with
respect to participation on any prospective Entry Date.&#160; The Board may also determine that a
designated group of highly compensated Employees (e.g., Employees subject to Section&nbsp;16(b)&nbsp;of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934) are ineligible to participate in the
Plan.&#160; An Employee shall be considered
employed on a full-time basis unless his or her customary employment is less
than 20 hours per week or five months per year.&#160;
No Employee may participate in the Plan if immediately after an option
is granted the Employee owns or is considered to own (within the meaning of
Code Section&nbsp;424(d)), shares of stock, including stock which the Employee
may purchase by conversion of convertible securities or under outstanding
options granted by the Corporation, possessing five percent (5%) or more of the
total combined voting power or value of all classes of stock of the Corporation
or of any of its Subsidiaries.&#160; All
Employees who participate in the Plan shall have the same rights and privileges
under the Plan except for differences which may be mandated by local law and
which are consistent with Code Section&nbsp;423(b)(5).&#160; The Board may impose restrictions on
eligibility and participation of Employees who are officers and directors to
facilitate compliance with federal or state securities laws or foreign laws.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font face="Times New Roman" style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a4_Participation__105211"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>PARTICIPATION.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">4.1</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">An Employee who is eligible to participate in the Plan in
accordance with Section&nbsp;3 may become a Participant by filing, on a date
prescribed by the Committee prior to an</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">applicable Entry Date, a completed payroll deduction
authorization and Plan enrollment form provided by the Corporation.&#160; An eligible Employee may authorize payroll
deductions at the rate of any whole percentage (i.e., 1%, 2%, 3%, etc.), up to
the Maximum Percentage, of either (i)&nbsp;the Employee&#146;s Base Compensation, or
(ii)&nbsp;the Employee&#146;s Base Compensation and Bonus Compensation, as elected
by the Employee in the payroll deduction authorization and Plan enrollment
form. If an Employee has elected to participate in the Plan but has not made an
election whether payroll deductions should be calculated and withheld from the
Employee&#146;s Base Compensation, or from the Employee&#146;s Base Compensation and
Bonus Compensation, then payroll deductions shall be calculated and withheld
from such Employee&#146;s Base Compensation only.&#160;
All payroll deductions may be held by the Corporation and commingled
with its other corporate funds.&#160; No
interest shall be paid or credited to the Participant with respect to such
payroll deductions except where required by local law as determined by the
Committee.&#160; A separate bookkeeping
account for each Participant shall be maintained by the Corporation under the
Plan and the amount of each Participant&#146;s payroll deductions shall be credited
to such account.&#160; A Participant may not
make any additional payments into such account.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">4.2</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">Under procedures established by the Committee, a
Participant may suspend or discontinue participation in the Plan at any time
during an Exercise Period by completing and filing a new payroll deduction
authorization and Plan enrollment form with the Corporation.&#160; A Participant may increase or decrease his or
her rate of payroll deductions, or change his or her election of the portion of
Compensation (i.e., Base Compensation, or Base Compensation and Bonus
Compensation) from which payroll deductions will be calculated and withheld, by
filing a new payroll deduction authorization and Plan enrollment form at any
time. Changes in rate shall be effective as soon as reasonably practicable
after the Corporation has received such form.&#160;
Changes in the portion of Compensation from which payroll deductions
will be calculated and withheld will be effective for the next commencing
Exercise Period, subject to continuing eligibility of the Participant pursuant
to Section&nbsp;3.&#160; The Committee may
establish rules&nbsp;limiting the frequency with which Participants may
increase or decrease the rate of payroll deduction, or change the election of
the portion of Compensation from which payroll deductions will be calculated
and withheld, and may impose a waiting period on Participants wishing to
increase the rate of payroll deductions after a decrease. If a new payroll
deduction authorization and Plan enrollment form is not filed with the
Corporation, the rate of payroll deductions and the portion of Compensation
from which payroll deductions will be calculated and withheld shall continue as
originally elected (i)&nbsp;throughout the Option Period and (ii)&nbsp;subject
to continued eligibility as determined under Section&nbsp;3, for succeeding
Option Periods; unless in either case the Committee determines to change the
Maximum Percentage.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If a
Participant suspends participation during an Exercise Period, his or her
accumulated payroll deductions will remain in the Plan for purchase of shares
as specified in Section&nbsp;6 on the following Exercise Date, but the
Participant will not again participate until he or she completes a new payroll
deduction authorization and Plan enrollment form.&#160; The Committee may establish rules&nbsp;limiting
the frequency with which Participants may suspend and resume payroll deductions
under the Plan and may impose a waiting period on Participants wishing to
resume suspended payroll deductions.&#160; If
a Participant discontinues participation in the Plan, the amount credited to</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the Participant&#146;s individual account shall be paid to the Participant
without interest (except where required by local law).&#160; In the event any Participant terminates
employment with the Corporation or any Subsidiary for any reason (including
death) prior to the expiration of an Option Period, the Participant&#146;s
participation in the Plan shall terminate and all amounts credited to the Participant&#146;s
account shall be paid to the Participant or the Participant&#146;s estate without
interest (except where required by local law).&#160;
Whether a termination of employment has occurred shall be determined by
the Committee.&#160; The Committee may also establish
rules&nbsp;regarding when leaves of absence or change of employment status
(e.g., from full-time to part-time) will be considered to be a termination of
employment, and the Committee may establish termination of employment
procedures for this Plan which are independent of similar rules&nbsp;established
under other benefit plans of the Corporation and its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event
of a Participant&#146;s death, any accumulated payroll deductions will be paid,
without interest, to the estate of the Participant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a5_Offering__105213"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>OFFERING.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">5.1</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">The maximum number of shares of Common Stock which may be
issued pursuant to the Plan shall be 600,000 shares.&#160; The Board may designate any amount of
available shares for offering for any Option Period determined pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">5.2</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">Each Option Period, Entry Date and Exercise Period shall be
determined by the Board.&#160; The Board shall
have the power to change the duration of future Option Periods or future
Exercise Periods, and to determine whether or not to have overlapping Option
Periods, with respect to any prospective offering, without shareholder
approval, and without regard to the expectations of any Participants.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">5.3</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">With respect to each Option Period, each eligible Employee
who has elected to participate as provided in Section&nbsp;4.1 shall be granted
an option to purchase that number of shares of Common Stock which may be
purchased with the payroll deductions accumulated on behalf of such Employee
(assuming payroll deductions at a rate of 15% of Compensation) during each
Exercise Period within such Option Period at the purchase price specified in Section&nbsp;5.4
below; provided, however, (1)&nbsp;in no event shall the Employee be entitled
to accrue rights to purchase shares under the Plan (and all other employee
stock purchase plans, as defined in Code Section&nbsp;423, of the Corporation
and its subsidiaries) at a rate which exceeds $25,000 of the Fair Market Value
of such stock (determined at the time the option is granted) for any calendar
year in which such option is outstanding at any time, and (2)&nbsp;the maximum
shares subject to any option shall in no event exceed 1,500.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">5.4</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">The option price under each option shall be determined by
the Board or Committee as either:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-kk.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a percentage, not less than 85%,
established by the Board or Committee (the &#147;Designated Percentage&#148;) of the Fair
Market Value on the Exercise Date on which the Common Stock is purchased; or</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the lower of (i)&nbsp;the Designated
Percentage of the Fair Market Value of the Common Stock on the Entry Date on
which an option is granted, or (ii)&nbsp;the Designated Percentage of the Fair
Market Value on the Exercise Date on which the Common Stock is purchased.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board or
Committee may change the Designated Percentage with respect to any future Option
Period, but not below 85%.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">5.5</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">If the total number of shares of Common Stock for which
options granted under the Plan are exercisable exceeds the maximum number of
shares offered on any Entry Date, the number of shares which may be purchased
under options granted on the Entry Date shall be reduced on a pro rata basis in
as nearly a uniform manner as shall be practicable and equitable.&#160; In this event, payroll deductions shall also
be reduced or refunded accordingly.&#160; If
an Employee&#146;s payroll deductions during any Exercise Period exceeds the
purchase price for the maximum number of shares permitted to be purchased under
Section&nbsp;5.3, the excess shall be refunded to the Participant without
interest (except where otherwise required by local law).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">5.6</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">If the option price is determined in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.4(b),
then in the event that the Fair Market Value of the Corporation&#146;s Common Stock
is lower on the first day of an Exercise Period within an Option Period
(subsequent &#147;Reassessment Date&#148;) than it was on the Entry Date for such Option
Period, all Employees participating in the Plan on the Reassessment Date shall
be deemed to have relinquished the unexercised portion of the option granted on
the Entry Date and to have enrolled in and received a new option commencing on
such Reassessment Date, unless the Board has determined not to permit
overlapping Option Periods or to restrict such transfers to lower price Option
Periods.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a6_PurchaseOfStock__105216"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">6.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>PURCHASE
OF STOCK.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon the
expiration of each Exercise Period, a Participant&#146;s option shall be exercised
automatically for the purchase of that number of full shares of Common Stock
which the accumulated payroll deductions credited to the Participant&#146;s account
at that time shall purchase at the applicable price specified in Section&nbsp;5.4.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a7_PaymentAndDelivery__105217"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">7.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>PAYMENT
AND DELIVERY.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon the
exercise of an option, the Corporation shall deliver to the Participant the
Common Stock purchased and the balance of any amount of payroll deductions
credited to the Participant&#146;s account not used for the purchase.&#160; The Board may permit or require that shares
be deposited directly with a broker designated by the Participant (or a broker
selected by the Committee) or to a designated agent of the Company, and the
Committee may utilize electronic or automated methods of share transfer.&#160; The Board may require that shares be retained
with</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-kk.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">such broker or agent for a designated period of time (and may restrict
dispositions during that period) and/or may establish other procedures to
permit tracking of disqualifying dispositions of such shares or to restrict
transfer of such shares.&#160; To the extent
the unused cash balance represents a fractional share, the unused cash balance
credited to the Participant&#146;s account shall be carried over to the next
Exercise Period, if the Participant is also a Participant in the Plan at that
time or refunded to the Participant, as determined by the Committee.&#160; The Corporation shall retain the amount of
payroll deductions used to purchase Common Stock as full payment for the Common
Stock and the Common Stock shall then be fully paid and non-assessable.&#160; No Participant shall have any voting,
dividend, or other stockholder rights with respect to shares subject to any
option granted under the Plan until the option has been exercised and shares
issued.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a8_Recapitalization__105218"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>RECAPITALIZATION.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If after the
grant of an option, but prior to the purchase of Common Stock under the option,
there is any increase or decrease in the number of outstanding shares of Common
Stock because of a stock split, stock dividend, combination or recapitalization
of shares subject to options, the number of shares to be purchased pursuant to
an option, the share limit of Section&nbsp;5.3 and the maximum number of shares
specified in Section&nbsp;5.1 shall be proportionately increased or decreased,
the terms relating to the purchase price with respect to the option shall be
appropriately adjusted by the Board, and the Board shall take any further
actions which, in the exercise of its discretion, may be necessary or
appropriate under the circumstances.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board, if
it so determines in the exercise of its sole discretion, also may adjust the
number of shares specified in Section&nbsp;5.1, as well as the price per share
of Common Stock covered by each outstanding option and the maximum number of
shares subject to any individual option, in the event the Corporation effects
one or more reorganizations, recapitalizations, spin-offs, split-ups, rights
offerings or reductions of shares of its outstanding Common Stock.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board&#146;s
determinations under this Section&nbsp;8 shall be conclusive and binding on all
parties.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a9_MergerLiquidationOtherCorporat_105220"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>MERGER,
LIQUIDATION, OTHER CORPORATION TRANSACTIONS.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event
of the proposed liquidation or dissolution of the Corporation, the Option
Period will terminate immediately prior to the consummation of such proposed
transaction, unless otherwise provided by the Board in its sole discretion, and
all outstanding options shall automatically terminate and the amounts of all
payroll deductions will be refunded without interest to the Participants.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event
of a proposed sale of all or substantially all of the assets of the
Corporation, or the merger or consolidation of the Corporation with or into
another corporation, then in the sole discretion of the Board, (1)&nbsp;each
option shall be assumed or an equivalent option shall be substituted by the
successor corporation or parent or subsidiary of such successor corporation,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)&nbsp;a date established by the Board on or before the date of
consummation of such merger, consolidation or sale shall be treated as an
Exercise Date, and all outstanding options shall be deemed exercisable on such
date or (3)&nbsp;all outstanding options shall terminate and the accumulated payroll
deductions shall be returned to the Participants.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a10_Transferability__105222"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>TRANSFERABILITY.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Options
granted to Participants may not be voluntarily or involuntarily assigned,
transferred, pledged, or otherwise disposed of in any way, and any attempted
assignment, transfer, pledge, or other disposition shall be null and void and
without effect.&#160; If a Participant in any
manner attempts to transfer, assign or otherwise encumber his or her rights or
interest under the Plan, other than as permitted by the Code, such act shall be
treated as an election by the participant to discontinue participation in the
Plan pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.2.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a11_AmendmentOrTerminationOfThePl_105223"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>AMENDMENT
OR TERMINATION OF THE PLAN.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">11.1</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">The Plan shall continue until, January&nbsp;31, 2007 unless
previously terminated in accordance with Section&nbsp;11.2.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">11.2</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">The Board may, in its sole discretion, insofar as permitted
by law, terminate or suspend the Plan, or revise or amend it in any respect
whatsoever, except that, without approval of the shareholders, no such revision
or amendment shall:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>materially
increase the number of shares subject to the Plan, other than an adjustment
under Section&nbsp;8 of the Plan;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>materially
modify the requirements as to eligibility for participation in the Plan, except
as otherwise specified in this Plan;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>materially
increase the benefits accruing to Participants;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>reduce
the purchase price specified in Section&nbsp;5.4, except as specified in Section&nbsp;8;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>extend
the term of the Plan beyond the date specified in Section&nbsp;11.1; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>amend
this Section&nbsp;11.2 to defeat its purpose.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a12_Administration__105225"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>ADMINISTRATION.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board
shall appoint a Committee consisting of at least two members who will serve for
such period of time as the Board may specify and who may be removed by the
Board at any time.&#160; The Committee will have
the authority and responsibility for the day-to-day administration of the Plan,
the authority and responsibility specifically provided in this Plan and any
additional duties, responsibility and authority delegated to the Committee by
the Board, which may include</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-kk.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">any of the functions assigned to the Board in this Plan.&#160; The Committee shall have full power and
authority to promulgate any rules&nbsp;and regulations which it deems necessary
for the proper administration of the Plan, to interpret the provisions and
supervise the administration of the Plan, and to take all action in connection
with administration of the Plan as it deems necessary or advisable, consistent
with the delegation from the Board.&#160;
Decisions of the Board and the Committee shall be final and binding upon
all participants.&#160; Any decision reduced
to writing and signed by a majority of the members of the Committee shall be
fully effective as if it had been made at a meeting of the Committee duly
held.&#160; The Corporation shall pay all
expenses incurred in the administration of the Plan.&#160; No Board or Committee member shall be liable
for any action or determination made in good faith with respect to the Plan or
any option granted thereunder.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a13_CommitteeRulesForForeignJuris_105227"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">13.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>COMMITTEE
RULES FOR FOREIGN JURISDICTIONS.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Committee
may adopt rules&nbsp;or procedures relating to the operation and administration
of the Plan in non-United States jurisdictions to accommodate the specific
requirements of local laws and procedures.&#160;
Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, the Committee is
specifically authorized to adopt rules&nbsp;and procedures regarding handling
of payroll deductions, payment of interest, conversion of local currency,
withholding procedures and handling of stock certificates which vary with local
requirements.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a14_SecuritiesLawsRequirements__105228"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">14.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>SECURITIES
LAWS REQUIREMENTS.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
Corporation shall not be under any obligation to issue Common Stock upon the
exercise of any option unless and until the Corporation has determined that: (i)&nbsp;it
and the Participant have taken all actions required to register the Common
Stock under the Securities Act of 1933, or to perfect an exemption from the
registration requirements thereof; (ii)&nbsp;any applicable listing requirement
of any stock exchange on which the Common Stock is listed has been satisfied;
and (iii)&nbsp;all other applicable provisions of state, federal and applicable
foreign law have been satisfied.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a15_GovernmentalRegulations__105230"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">15.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>GOVERNMENTAL
REGULATIONS.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Plan and
the Corporation&#146;s obligation to sell and deliver shares of its stock under the
Plan shall be subject to the approval of any governmental authority required in
connection with the Plan or the authorization, issuance, sale, or delivery of
stock hereunder.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a16_NoEnlargementOfEmployeeRights_105235"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">16.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>NO
ENLARGEMENT OF EMPLOYEE RIGHTS.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nothing
contained in this Plan shall be deemed to give any Employee the right to be
retained in the employ of the Corporation or any Designated Subsidiary or to
interfere with the right of the Corporation or Designated Subsidiary to
discharge any Employee at any time.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a17_GoverningLaw__105248"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">17.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>GOVERNING
LAW.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Plan
shall be governed by California law.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-16127-1\task574706\16127-1-kk.htm',USER='nkcanthadai',CD='Sep 13 12:55 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><a name="a18_EffectiveDateAndSubsequentPla_105249"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">18.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>EFFECTIVE
DATE AND SUBSEQUENT PLAN HISTORY.</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">This Plan became
effective on the first date in 1997 in which the Common Stock traded on the
Nasdaq System or Nasdaq National Market System.&#160;
The Board approved an increase in shares of Common Stock that may be
issued under the Plan from 250,000 to 500,000 on September&nbsp;25, 1998, which
increase was approved by shareholders on November&nbsp;12, 1998.&#160; The Board approved certain amendments to the
Plan on August&nbsp;20, 2003, which amendments did not require the approval of
the shareholders of the Corporation.&#160; The
Board approved an increase in shares of Common Stock that may be issued under
the Plan from 500,000 to 600,000 on September&nbsp;6, 2003, which increase is
reflected in Section&nbsp;5.1, but is subject to approval of the shareholders
of the Corporation within 12 months of its adoption by the Board of
Directors.&#160; The Board approved certain
amendments to the Plan on August&nbsp;11, 2005, effective August&nbsp;22, 2005,
which amendments did not require the approval of the shareholders of the
Corporation.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>
